text: What's your most underrated Claude Code trick?
@alexalbert__ letting it autonomously control an mbot robot https://t.co/0TKfEUj6M6

claude code is having it's cursor moment after karpathy sensei's post. never been a better time to try it. 

my latest blog on how to get the most out of claude code 2.0  and other agents in general is up now. grab a chai and have fun reading!

https://t.co/cQpvo0xocY https://t.co/gzKCEMfEG6

@dejavucoder tbh i have a very limited experience of claude code and i am learning how to efficiently use it. there are not many tutorials/guides (and some don’t go in depth from a dev’s perspective). this is a goldmine blog for beginners! thanks for writing it.
